name: Deployed
description:
This was my EPQ project and it is titled 'Deployed'. All you need to know is that you need to press and hold space to jump, and it is an endless runner style game that gets a bit harder incrementally. Although the project itself is very simple, this took me 7 months to devise and complete as I never made a game on unity before nor have I coded in C# before.

Credit to SNK for some of the assets (Please do not sue me) and Oliver R for the music composition used in the main menu. Everything else was made entirely by me.
